statements: DELETE FROM image_keypoints_descriptors WHERE image_id = 100 AND keypoints ->> 'type' = 'corner';
DELETE FROM image_keypoints_descriptors WHERE image_id = 100 AND descriptors -> 'feature' = 'sift';
DELETE FROM keypoints WHERE image_id = 10 AND keypoint_id = 3;
DELETE FROM matches WHERE image1_id = 10 AND image2_id = 20;
DELETE FROM image_matches WHERE match_score < 0.5 AND image1_id = 5;
DELETE FROM image_registration WHERE registration_id IN (SELECT registration_id FROM image_registration ORDER BY registration_id DESC LIMIT 1);
